WRITING.TEXT: Why on earth would he stay at home? If death is coming, he wouldn't want it in his house, with his children and wife there.
Religious views shouldn't be taken into consideration here. All we're asking is that it should be allowed. we're not asking people to partake in it.
I read into it wrong. My bad. But I did ask you for to support your claim first. I asked for the reason for your belief.
Another fallacious argument, just because I can't prove you're wrong doesn't mean that you're right. [Argumentum ignoratium.](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argument_from_ignorance)
Then we talk about percentage. A significant percentage and we don't condone it. But to know if the percentage is significant we need polls and support material to see the case.
You're stereotyping this and saying that that's what fathers will do. You can't generalise this, that's also fallacious argument.
There's a chance of inbreeding so let's stop it entirely? Wtf? Besides, what's wrong with inbreeding anyway?
